snippet.title: Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition | Devlog | Designing for VR
snippet.description:
In Rival Stars Horse Racing: VR Edition, you can become an equestrian champion from the comfort of your home! Meet our development team and find out how we are using game design to create a comfortable virtual equestrian experience. 

Wishlist now for Quest 2 and Quest 3 https://link.pikpok.com/3Ypef5N
Wishlist on Steam https://link.pikpok.com/3UcXdFx
